noun.description: Christian Church. Christ's shedding of his own blood for the salvation of mankind.

adjective.description: That sheds blood; that involves the shedding of blood; that causes death by bloodshed, murderous.

origin: Middle English; earliest use found in Ancrene Riwle. From blood + shedding, after to shed blood<br>mid 16th century. From blood + shedding, after bloodshed and to shed blood.
